askGender: What is your gender? You can say Male, Female, or Other.
askEducation: What is your highest education level? For example, 10th Pass, 12th Pass, or Graduate.
askExperience: How many years of work experience do you have? Please just say the number. Say 0 if you are a fresher.
askLastSalary: What was your last salary per month? Please just say the number. Say 0 if you are a fresher.
askExpectedSalary: What is your expected salary per month? Please just say the number.
askTravelDistance: How far are you willing to travel for work? For example, 10 to 20 kilometers.
askRole: Finally, what type of job are you looking for? For example, Plumber, Driver, or Painter.
